abstrac: Certified IT professional with proven experience planning, implementing, and maintaining network and end-user systems across multiple platforms.
bio: Served as a Systems Admin in a Windows/AIX environment with over 6000 users and machines. Before that, serving in the US Army for 8 years as a Systems Technician which culminated in serving as a battalion-level IT Manager for the last 3 years. Extensive experience with the Windows Server 2003/2008/2012 environments involving SCCM, DHCP, DNS, Identity and Access, as well as end-user support for Windows XP/7/8, MS Office, Routers, Switches and other Network devices. Worked in a end-user support capacity as well as server and security administrator capacity throughout military and private enterprise career.
